slug: /168
title: "This Week In React #168: TanStack, useMemo, RSC, preload, flushSync, shadcn-ui, MDX, Storybook, StyleX, TWC, Tokenami, Catalyst, rsc-cache, WishList, VisionOS, Hermes, release-profiler..."

segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!

segments.content: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! 🥂
segments.sourceMdx: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! 🥂

segments.content: The newsletter is back for another year. Despite the holiday season we still had some interesting news, notably regarding the TanStack. Developers probably took this opportunity to work on their own open-source side projects 😄!
segments.sourceMdx: The newsletter is back for another year. Despite the holiday season we still had some interesting news, notably regarding the TanStack. Developers probably took this opportunity to work on their own open-source side projects 😄!
segments.translated_content: 本年度通讯再度启航。尽管正值假期，我们仍收获了一些有趣的消息，尤其是关于TanStack的动向。开发者们可能正借此机会打磨他们的开源副业项目😄！

segments.content: Don't forget to answer the [State of React Native 2023 survey](https://stateofreactnative.com/), it's your last chance!
segments.sourceMdx: Don't forget to answer the [State of React Native 2023 survey](https://stateofreactnative.com/), it's your last chance!
segments.translated_content: 别忘了参与[2023年React Native现状调查](https://stateofreactnative.com/)，这是最后的机会！

segments.content: Once again, this issue now has 2 authors [Benedikt](https://twitter.com/bndkt) is helping me.
segments.sourceMdx: Once again, this issue now has 2 authors [Benedikt](https://twitter.com/bndkt) is helping me.
segments.translated_content: 再次声明，本期通讯由[Benedikt](https://twitter.com/bndkt)与我共同执笔。

segments.content: I hope to find time to write a full 2023 retrospective of the newsletter. Until then, if you are curious, I write monthly reports on my [Indie Hackers page](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter) for 2 years now.
segments.sourceMdx: I hope to find time to write a full 2023 retrospective of the newsletter. Until then, if you are curious, I write monthly reports on my [Indie Hackers page](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter) for 2 years now.
segments.translated_content: 我希望能抽空撰写这份通讯的2023年度回顾。在此之前，如果你感兴趣，可以查看我在[Indie Hackers页面](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter)上持续两年的月度报告。

segments.content: **[A newsletter helping flex your product muscle](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir\&utm_campaign=twir)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[A newsletter helping flex your product muscle](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=twir)**

segments.content: [**Product for Engineers**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir\&utm_campaign=twir) is PostHog’s newsletter dedicated to helping engineers improve their product skills. Learn what questions to ask users, how to build new features users love, and the path to product market fit. [**Subscribe for free**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir\&utm_campaign=twir) to get curated advice on building great products, lessons (and mistakes) from building PostHog, and deep dives into the strategies of top startups.
segments.sourceMdx: [**Product for Engineers**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=twir) is PostHog’s newsletter dedicated to helping engineers improve their product skills. Learn what questions to ask users, how to build new features users love, and the path to product market fit. [**Subscribe for free**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=twir) to get curated advice on building great products, lessons (and mistakes) from building PostHog, and deep dives into the strategies of top startups.
segments.translated_content: [**工程师的产品思维**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=twir)是PostHog推出的专注于帮助工程师提升产品技能的通讯。学习如何向用户提问、打造用户喜爱的新功能，以及实现产品市场匹配的路径。[**免费订阅**](https://newsletter.posthog.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=twir)，获取关于打造优秀产品的精选建议、PostHog构建过程中的经验教训（及错误），以及对顶级初创公司策略的深度解析。

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.content: [![TanStack Router 1.0](/emails/issues/168/tanstack-router.jpg)](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)
segments.sourceMdx: [![TanStack Router 1.0](/emails/issues/168/tanstack-router.jpg)](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)

segments.content: **[TanStack Router 1.0](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[TanStack Router 1.0](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)**

segments.content: The highly anticipated TanStack Router launched as stable 1.0 with a nice [🐦 trailer](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1738709130213560497), just in time for Christmas. This new router pushes the boundary of what is possible in terms of type-safety, url state management (search params) and caching, among other things.
segments.sourceMdx: The highly anticipated TanStack Router launched as stable 1.0 with a nice [🐦 trailer](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1738709130213560497), just in time for Christmas. This new router pushes the boundary of what is possible in terms of type-safety, url state management (search params) and caching, among other things.
segments.translated_content: 备受期待的TanStack Router以稳定版1.0姿态发布，并配有一支精美的[🐦宣传视频](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1738709130213560497)，恰逢圣诞佳节。这款新路由器在类型安全、URL状态管理（搜索参数）和缓存等方面突破了现有可能性边界。

segments.content: The [SSR guide](https://tanstack.com/router/v1/docs/guide/ssr) reference a `@tanstack/react-start` package, probably a teaser for an upcoming [🐦 TanStack Start framework](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742589454563369123)
segments.sourceMdx: The [SSR guide](https://tanstack.com/router/v1/docs/guide/ssr) reference a `@tanstack/react-start` package, probably a teaser for an upcoming [🐦 TanStack Start framework](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742589454563369123)
segments.translated_content: 其[SSR指南](https://tanstack.com/router/v1/docs/guide/ssr)提及了`@tanstack/react-start`包，这可能是对即将推出的[🐦 TanStack Start框架](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742589454563369123)的预告。

segments.content: Other recent TanStack packages that you might have missed:
segments.sourceMdx: Other recent TanStack packages that you might have missed:
segments.translated_content: 你可能错过的其他近期TanStack包：

segments.content:
* 📦 [TanStack Config - Tool for publishing and maintaining high-quality JavaScript packages](https://github.com/TanStack/config)
* 📦 [TanStack Store - Framework agnostic, type-safe store with reactive framework adapters](https://tanstack.com/store/latest)
segments.sourceMdx:
- 📦 [TanStack Config - Tool for publishing and maintaining high-quality JavaScript packages](https://github.com/TanStack/config)
- 📦 [TanStack Store - Framework agnostic, type-safe store with reactive framework adapters](https://tanstack.com/store/latest)
segments.translated_content:
- 📦 [TanStack Config - 用于发布和维护高质量JavaScript包的工具](https://github.com/TanStack/config)
- 📦 [TanStack Store - 框架无关、类型安全的存储库，带有响应式框架适配器](https://tanstack.com/store/latest)

segments.content:
* 💸 [From Dreamweaver to JSX: The Evolution of Visual Dev Tools for the Web](https://mightymeld.com/blog/browser-dev-tools-understand-code?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=link1)
* 👀 [React Docs PR - React-DOM static resource loading functions](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459)
* 👀 [Next.js PR - Next.js is exploring moving to Lightning CSS](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/58712)
* 👀 [Remix PR - SPA Mode](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8338)
* 🐦 [useMemo to become a better version of context selectors](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1741218919732429108): It turns out [selectors do not compose well](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1741200483862151663), and the plan is to improve useMemo to kind of act like a selector!
* 🐦 [SkipRenderOnClient - interesting trick to optimize hydration performance](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742528219318738955)
* 🐦 [Million.js joins Y Combinator](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1737929698221682789)
* 📜 [React Server Components: the Good, the Bad, and the Ugly](https://www.mayank.co/blog/react-server-components/): Critical, but well-informed take on the status quo of using RSC.
* 📜 [Thoughts on Remix](https://www.viget.com/articles/thoughts-on-remix/): Balanced view on Remix - where it came from, their philosophy and how it compares to Next.js.
* 📜 [More Than You Need to Know About ReactDOM.­flushSync](https://julesblom.com/writing/flushsync): Detailed and interactive look at React-DOM `flushSync()` method, a rarely used but sometimes crucial method enabling you to opt-out of React state update batching.
* 📜 [Remix + MDX - How this site is built](https://remix-blog-mdx.fly.dev/): Vite features and plugins work together to power Remix + MDX.
* 📜 [The View Transition API: A New Way to Animate Page Transitions](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/12/21/view-transitions.html): Also shows how to use it in React Router and Remix.
* 📜 [What should we ship?](https://rauno.me/craft/vercel): Detailed blog post about the vercel.com relaunch.
* 📜 [Future of Storybook in 2024](https://storybook.js.org/blog/future-of-storybook-2024/): The themes for Storybook in 2024 will be application development (as opposed to isolated component development), enhanced support for non-React frameworks, and improved story generation (using AI).
* 📜 [How to make Storybook 2-4x faster - v7.6 comes with perf improvement options, enabled by default in v8.0](https://storybook.js.org/blog/optimize-storybook-7-6/)
* 📜 [Next.js 14 Parallel Routes](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-parallel-routes): Simultaneously render multiple pages within the same layout (useful for dashboards).
* 📜 [Next.js 14 Intercepting Routes](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-intercepting-routes)
* 📜 [Understanding React’s useFormState and useFormStatus Hooks](https://blog.logrocket.com/understanding-react-useformstate-useformstatus-hooks/)
* 📜 [Diving into Server Actions in Next.js 14](https://blog.logrocket.com/diving-into-server-actions-next-js-14/)
* 📦 [rsc-cache - cache expensive RSCs, with Next.js integration](https://github.com/fredkiss3/rsc-cache)
* 📦 [Catalyst - Modern UI kit for React](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/introducing-catalyst): New official React UI kit from the Tailwind team. It's a paid product requiring a Tailwind UI license. There's also a free Headless UI update, now in v2.0 alpha.
* 📦 [Tokenami - Atomic CSS in the style attribute](https://github.com/tokenami/tokenami): Modern type-safe styling solution with theming, responsive variant support. Supports React and Solid.
* 📦 [shadcn-ui 0.5 - new components (Carousel, Drawer, Pagination, Resizable, Sonner) and CLI improvements](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/changelog)
* 📦 [StyleX 0.4.1 - ESLint and Rollup plugin improvements, autocomplete, performance, reduced runtime size, support for CSS layers...](https://stylexjs.com/blog/v0.4.1)
* 📦 [Storybook 8.0.0 alpha 4 - no react peer dependency anymore](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/releases/tag/v8.0.0-alpha.4)
* 📦 [TWC - Create reusable Tailwind CSS + React components](https://react-twc.vercel.app/)
* 📦 [MDXTS - Build interactive, type-safe content and documentation in MDX, TypeScript, and React](https://www.mdxts.dev/)
* 📦 [Plate - Rich-text editor framework for React, customizable, including a plugin system](https://platejs.org/)
* 📦 [next-route-handler-pipe - Function pipelines for Next.js route handlers](https://github.com/KolbySisk/next-route-handler-pipe)
segments.sourceMdx:
- 💸 [From Dreamweaver to JSX: The Evolution of Visual Dev Tools for the Web](https://mightymeld.com/blog/browser-dev-tools-understand-code?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=link1)
- 👀 [React Docs PR - React-DOM static resource loading functions](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459)
- 👀 [Next.js PR - Next.js is exploring moving to Lightning CSS](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/58712)
- 👀 [Remix PR - SPA Mode](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8338)
- 🐦 [useMemo to become a better version of context selectors](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1741218919732429108): It turns out [selectors do not compose well](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1741200483862151663), and the plan is to improve useMemo to kind of act like a selector!
- 🐦 [SkipRenderOnClient - interesting trick to optimize hydration performance](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742528219318738955)
- 🐦 [Million.js joins Y Combinator](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1737929698221682789)
- 📜 [React Server Components: the Good, the Bad, and the Ugly](https://www.mayank.co/blog/react-server-components/): Critical, but well-informed take on the status quo of using RSC.
- 📜 [Thoughts on Remix](https://www.viget.com/articles/thoughts-on-remix/): Balanced view on Remix - where it came from, their philosophy and how it compares to Next.js.
- 📜 [More Than You Need to Know About ReactDOM.­flushSync](https://julesblom.com/writing/flushsync): Detailed and interactive look at React-DOM `flushSync()` method, a rarely used but sometimes crucial method enabling you to opt-out of React state update batching.
- 📜 [Remix + MDX - How this site is built](https://remix-blog-mdx.fly.dev/): Vite features and plugins work together to power Remix + MDX.
- 📜 [The View Transition API: A New Way to Animate Page Transitions](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/12/21/view-transitions.html): Also shows how to use it in React Router and Remix.
- 📜 [What should we ship?](https://rauno.me/craft/vercel): Detailed blog post about the vercel.com relaunch.
- 📜 [Future of Storybook in 2024](https://storybook.js.org/blog/future-of-storybook-2024/): The themes for Storybook in 2024 will be application development (as opposed to isolated component development), enhanced support for non-React frameworks, and improved story generation (using AI).
- 📜 [How to make Storybook 2-4x faster - v7.6 comes with perf improvement options, enabled by default in v8.0](https://storybook.js.org/blog/optimize-storybook-7-6/)
- 📜 [Next.js 14 Parallel Routes](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-parallel-routes): Simultaneously render multiple pages within the same layout (useful for dashboards).
- 📜 [Next.js 14 Intercepting Routes](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-intercepting-routes)
- 📜 [Understanding React’s useFormState and useFormStatus Hooks](https://blog.logrocket.com/understanding-react-useformstate-useformstatus-hooks/)
- 📜 [Diving into Server Actions in Next.js 14](https://blog.logrocket.com/diving-into-server-actions-next-js-14/)
- 📦 [rsc-cache - cache expensive RSCs, with Next.js integration](https://github.com/fredkiss3/rsc-cache)
- 📦 [Catalyst - Modern UI kit for React](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/introducing-catalyst): New official React UI kit from the Tailwind team. It's a paid product requiring a Tailwind UI license. There's also a free Headless UI update, now in v2.0 alpha.
- 📦 [Tokenami - Atomic CSS in the style attribute](https://github.com/tokenami/tokenami): Modern type-safe styling solution with theming, responsive variant support. Supports React and Solid.
- 📦 [shadcn-ui 0.5 - new components (Carousel, Drawer, Pagination, Resizable, Sonner) and CLI improvements](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/changelog)
- 📦 [StyleX 0.4.1 - ESLint and Rollup plugin improvements, autocomplete, performance, reduced runtime size, support for CSS layers...](https://stylexjs.com/blog/v0.4.1)
- 📦 [Storybook 8.0.0 alpha 4 - no react peer dependency anymore](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/releases/tag/v8.0.0-alpha.4)
- 📦 [TWC - Create reusable Tailwind CSS + React components](https://react-twc.vercel.app/)
- 📦 [MDXTS - Build interactive, type-safe content and documentation in MDX, TypeScript, and React](https://www.mdxts.dev/)
- 📦 [Plate - Rich-text editor framework for React, customizable, including a plugin system](https://platejs.org/)
- 📦 [next-route-handler-pipe - Function pipelines for Next.js route handlers](https://github.com/KolbySisk/next-route-handler-pipe)
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [从Dreamweaver到JSX：网页可视化开发工具的演进](https://mightymeld.com/blog/browser-dev-tools-understand-code?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=link1)
- 👀 [React文档PR - React-DOM静态资源加载函数](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459)
- 👀 [Next.js PR - Next.js正探索迁移至Lightning CSS](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/58712)
- 👀 [Remix PR - SPA模式](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8338)
- 🐦 [useMemo将成为context选择器的升级版](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1741218919732429108)：事实证明[选择器难以组合使用](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1741200483862151663)，计划改进useMemo使其具备类似选择器的功能！
- 🐦 [SkipRenderOnClient - 优化hydration性能的巧妙技巧](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1742528219318738955)
- 🐦 [Million.js加入Y Combinator](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1737929698221682789)
- 📜 [React服务端组件：优势、缺陷与痛点](https://www.mayank.co/blog/react-server-components/)：对RSC使用现状的批判性但见解深刻的评价。
- 📜 [关于Remix的思考](https://www.viget.com/articles/thoughts-on-remix/)：对Remix的平衡观点——其起源、设计哲学及与Next.js的对比。
- 📜 [深入理解ReactDOM.flushSync](https://julesblom.com/writing/flushsync)：详细且交互式解析React-DOM中鲜为人知但关键的方法flushSync()，该方法可绕过React状态更新的批量处理机制。
- 📜 [Remix + MDX - 本网站的构建之道](https://remix-blog-mdx.fly.dev/)：Vite特性与插件协同支持Remix与MDX集成。
- 📜 [视图过渡API：页面动画转场新方案](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/12/21/view-transitions.html)：同时展示在React Router和Remix中的使用方法。
- 📜 [我们该发布什么？](https://rauno.me/craft/vercel)：关于vercel.com改版的深度技术文章。
- 📜 [Storybook 2024年发展规划](https://storybook.js.org/blog/future-of-storybook-2024/)：Storybook新年的三大方向——应用开发（替代孤立组件开发）、增强非React框架支持、改进故事生成（利用AI）。
- 📜 [如何让Storybook提速2-4倍 - v7.6提供性能优化选项，v8.0将默认启用](https://storybook.js.org/blog/optimize-storybook-7-6/)
- 📜 [Next.js 14并行路由](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-parallel-routes)：在同一布局中同时渲染多个页面（适用于仪表盘场景）。
- 📜 [Next.js 14拦截路由](https://www.builder.io/blog/nextjs-14-intercepting-routes)
- 📜 [理解React的useFormState与useFormStatus钩子](https://blog.logrocket.com/understanding-react-useformstate-useformstatus-hooks/)
- 📜 [深入Next.js 14服务端操作](https://blog.logrocket.com/diving-into-server-actions-next-js-14/)
- 📦 [rsc-cache - 缓存高开销RSC，支持Next.js集成](https://github.com/fredkiss3/rsc-cache)
- 📦 [Catalyst - 现代React UI套件](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/introducing-catalyst)：Tailwind团队推出的官方React UI套件（需Tailwind UI许可证）。同时发布免费版Headless UI v2.0 alpha。
- 📦 [Tokenami - 原子化CSS样式属性方案](https://github.com/tokenami/tokenami)：支持主题化、响应式变体的类型安全样式方案，兼容React和Solid。
- 📦 [shadcn-ui 0.5 - 新增组件（轮播、抽屉、分页、可调整尺寸、提示框）及CLI改进](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/changelog)
- 📦 [StyleX 0.4.1 - ESLint/Rollup插件增强、自动补全、性能优化、运行时体积缩减、CSS层支持...](https://stylexjs.com/blog/v0.4.1)
- 📦 [Storybook 8.0.0 alpha 4 - 移除react对等依赖](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/releases/tag/v8.0.0-alpha.4)
- 📦 [TWC - 创建可复用的Tailwind CSS + React组件](https://react-twc.vercel.app/)
- 📦 [MDXTS - 基于MDX、TypeScript和React构建类型安全的交互式内容与文档](https://www.mdxts.dev/)
- 📦 [Plate - React富文本编辑器框架，支持插件系统定制](https://platejs.org/)
- 📦 [next-route-handler-pipe - Next.js路由处理器的函数管道](https://github.com/KolbySisk/next-route-handler-pipe)

segments.translated_content: **[ShipFast - 几天内交付你的创业项目，而非几周](https://shipfa.st/?via=twir)**

segments.content: The Next.js boilerplate with all you need to build your SaaS, AI tool, or any other web app and make your first $ online fast.
segments.sourceMdx: The Next.js boilerplate with all you need to build your SaaS, AI tool, or any other web app and make your first $ online fast.
segments.translated_content: 一个包含构建SaaS、AI工具或任何其他网络应用所需一切的Next.js样板项目，助你快速实现首次线上盈利。

segments.content:
* App Router or Page Router
* JavaScript or TypeScript
* Money-back guarantee, refundable within 7 days
segments.sourceMdx:
- App Router or Page Router
- JavaScript or TypeScript
- Money-back guarantee, refundable within 7 days
segments.translated_content:
- 应用路由或页面路由
- JavaScript或TypeScript
- 7天内无理由退款保证

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content:
* 💸 [Galaxies.dev - Master React Native & Save 25% on PRO with code GALAXIES24](https://galaxies.dev?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
* 📊 [State of React Native 2023 survey - Last-call, closing on Friday 5](https://stateofreactnative.com/)
* 👀 [RFC: Moving away from Obj-C on Apple platforms](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/747): Moving to Swift will only start after the move to the New Architecture has been completed.
* 👀 [hermes-jsi-demos - Use Hermes with JSI on desktop without any frameworks](https://github.com/tmikov/hermes-jsi-demos)
* 👀 [jsi-rs - Write ultra fast React Native modules in Rust](https://github.com/laptou/jsi-rs/)
* 🐦 [Expo SDK 50 optimizing bundle size with platform shaking](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1740487401414275120)
* 🐦 [Chain React 2024 announced for July 17-19](https://twitter.com/ChainReactConf/status/1737578373415928100)
* 🐦 [Top React Native Tweets of 2023](https://twitter.com/infinite_red/status/1737890233201623526)
* 📜 [WishList Release scrapped](https://margelo.notion.site/WishList-Summit-b20c24d1f0da4889a0513dfa929be5ed): After a year of development, Margelo decided not to release their library aimed at solving performance problems for lists in React Native.
* 📜 [Bringing React Native libraries to Apple Vision Pro](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/bringing-react-native-libraries-to-apple-vision-pro): the new out-of-tree VisionOS platform will support JS libs automatically. Most native libs will simply need to add a `visionos` platform to the podspec.
* 📜 [How to Properly Read Xcode Error](https://levelup.gitconnected.com/how-to-properly-read-xcode-error-7b979692333d)
* 📜 [JavaScript Achieves Breakthrough Performance with Static Hermes](https://medium.com/@elves.silva.vieira/javascript-achieves-breakthrough-performance-with-static-hermes-6286b0ac8ef7)
* 📦 [react-native-release-profiler - passively profile JS/Hermes in production and release builds](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-release-profiler)
* 📦 [expo-video-metadata](https://github.com/hirbod/expo-video-metadata): Retrieve information such as duration, dimensions, orientation, and codec for local and remote video files.
* 📦 [react-native-macos 0.73.1](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-macos/v/0.73.1)
* 📦 [react-native-windows 0.73.2](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.73.2)
* 📦 [Bootstrap a universal File-based Expo app with Tailwind styles](https://github.com/expo/examples/tree/master/with-router-tailwind): New create-expo-app template using Expo Router v3 and NativeWind v4.
* 🎙 [React Native Show 32 - React Native for Apple Vision Pro and visionOS](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/react-native-for-apple-vision-pro-and-visionos)
* 🎙️ [RNR 284 - React Native Rewind - 2023 in Review](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-284-react-native-rewind-2023-in-review)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 23 - Why you should use React Native in 2024](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/023-why-you-should-use-react-native-in-2024)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [Galaxies.dev - 掌握React Native并使用代码GALAXIES24享受PRO版25%折扣](https://galaxies.dev?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
- 📊 [2023年React Native现状调查 - 最后召集，周五5日截止](https://stateofreactnative.com/)
- 👀 [RFC：在Apple平台上逐步弃用Obj-C](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/747)：向Swift的迁移将在新架构迁移完成后启动。
- 👀 [hermes-jsi-demos - 在桌面端无框架环境下使用Hermes与JSI](https://github.com/tmikov/hermes-jsi-demos)
- 👀 [jsi-rs - 用Rust编写超高速React Native模块](https://github.com/laptou/jsi-rs/)
- 🐦 [Expo SDK 50通过平台摇树优化包体积](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1740487401414275120)
- 🐦 [Chain React 2024大会定档7月17-19日](https://twitter.com/ChainReactConf/status/1737578373415928100)
- 🐦 [2023年度React Native热门推文](https://twitter.com/infinite_red/status/1737890233201623526)
- 📜 [WishList Release项目终止](https://margelo.notion.site/WishList-Summit-b20c24d1f0da4889a0513dfa929be5ed)：经过一年开发，Margelo决定不发布旨在解决React Native列表性能问题的库。
- 📜 [将React Native库引入Apple Vision Pro](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/bringing-react-native-libraries-to-apple-vision-pro)：新的out-of-tree VisionOS平台将自动支持JS库，大多数原生库只需在podspec中添加`visionos`平台。
- 📜 [如何正确解读Xcode错误](https://levelup.gitconnected.com/how-to-properly-read-xcode-error-7b979692333d)
- 📜 [JavaScript通过静态Hermes实现性能突破](https://medium.com/@elves.silva.vieira/javascript-achieves-breakthrough-performance-with-static-hermes-6286b0ac8ef7)
- 📦 [react-native-release-profiler - 在生产环境和发布版本中被动分析JS/Hermes性能](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-release-profiler)
- 📦 [expo-video-metadata](https://github.com/hirbod/expo-video-metadata)：获取本地和远程视频文件的时长、尺寸、方向和编解码器等信息。
- 📦 [react-native-macos 0.73.1](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-macos/v/0.73.1)
- 📦 [react-native-windows 0.73.2](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.73.2)
- 📦 [使用Tailwind样式启动通用基于文件的Expo应用](https://github.com/expo/examples/tree/master/with-router-tailwind)：采用Expo Router v3和NativeWind v4的新create-expo-app模板。
- 🎙 [React Native Show第32期 - Apple Vision Pro和visionOS上的React Native](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/react-native-for-apple-vision-pro-and-visionos)
- 🎙️ [RNR第284期 - React Native年度回顾 - 2023年总结](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-284-react-native-rewind-2023-in-review)
- 🎙️ [Rocket Ship第23期 - 2024年为何应选择React Native](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/023-why-you-should-use-react-native-in-2024)
